name: A Drop of Hope
description:
A Drop of Hope is a 2D puzzle platformer set in an oppressive industrial world dominated by machines. In this reality, surrounded by destruction and despair, robotic abominations have taken over the entire planet and eliminated almost every form of life. Nature is condemned, and is just a shadow of what it used to be.

As a sentient water drop, you are the only chance of bringing life back to this sad reality. Use your unique properties while changing between different states of matter to overcome challenges and solve mind-cracking puzzles. Nature needs help to take back its rightful place.

Be water, my friend


In a world ruled by an ever-growing state of machines, factories and pollution, a single drop of hope suddenly grows conscious of the current state of affairs. Plants are being subjugated to satisfy the ruthless Smog-Cog.

The drop knows what it must do. But it needs the help of Nature laws, and yours, to dethrone the evil ruling force and bring life back into this hopeless world.

Use Nature laws at your favor


Change between liquid, solid and gaseous states to gain access to different abilities and solve puzzles. Grow plants again to restore Nature and put an end to the robotic tyranny.

Features


  • Change between 3 different physical states to gain access to special actions and unique abilities
  • Solve puzzles to progress through an engaging original story set in a world dominated by machines
  • 9 challenging puzzle levels with frenetic action-oriented segments
  • Rich and captivating original soundtrack
  • Grow plants and restore nature in a hopeless industrial reality
  • Sabotage machines in order to save the environment
